3 hours ago
3 hours ago
Unable to determine Booterror on Proxmox | Get Bootlog via ILO?
Hello,
I need to switch operating systems. I added another harddrive (SSD) to my server and installed proxmox.
Everything worked fine but it immediatly jumped to the old os in my boot options.
It seems that there is a very short appearance of the error message from proxmox but i canÂ´t figure out how to tell the server to show me this message as it immediatly jumps to secound boot option.
I am unable to find some bios option like "halt on errors" or sth.
I deleted all other boot options but then the message appears and he jumps back to bios post saying "no bootable os found" or sth. like that.
I already searched some kind of startup log in ILO(4) but i am unable to find.
Can you help me?
Physical access to server is available.
greetings
